cn.nju.game.equip

类 Equipment

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.nju.game.equip.Equipment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    HealthStrength, MagicalDamage, MagicalDenfence, PhysicalDamage, PhysicalDefence, java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    ComposedEquipment, SingleEquipment

    public abstract class Equipment
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhysicalDamage, PhysicalDefence, MagicalDamage, MagicalDenfence, java.io.Serializable, HealthStrength
